admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The Education Project will consist of:
            (a) the construction and equipment of five technical
            training centers, each located in a major area of industrial
            employment and serving from two to four senior technical
            secondary schools, offering them workshops and laboratory
            facilities; (b) the training of about 330 teachers to staff
            the centers; and (c) technical assistance to help in the
            initial operation and supervision of the centers.
